'''Moment of Bloom''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 5.1]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-10-29 18:00:00 &mdash; 2024-11-19 14:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {{Wish Item|Hu Tao}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters {{Wish Item|Sethos; Xingqiu; Kuki Shinobu}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
